content: Seven colours of the Rainbow SeriesMore details: Both coins have a '2mm' orange colour ring on the front and the back.Price list:Silver coin:  149 USD ONLY (excluding loading the coin with 0.001BTC)Gilded coin: 299 USD  ONLY (excluding loading the coin with 0.01BTC)Set of 'Silver+Gilded': 399 USD ONLY (excluding loading both the coins with 0.011BTC)DIY version available. comments.author: markinaz
comments.created_time: October 10, 2022, 12:59:32 PMLast edit: October 10, 2022, 02:39:10 PM by Markzellers

comments.author: HouseOfBAMF
comments.body: https://i.imgur.com/GATg3tH.jpg?s=smsThe coins showed up Friday. Really well made, nice finish especially on the gold. The photos don’t catch it well but the gold looks more natural opposed to highly polished. I prefer this look. The black and Orange coloring look like it was done very well. Very nice collectables. Prompt responses and communication from rarity check. Looking forward to what the future offerings In this set will look like!

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: HouseOfBAMF on November 08, 2022, 10:18:24 PMhttps://i.imgur.com/GATg3tH.jpg?s=smsThe coins showed up Friday. Really well made, nice finish especially on the gold. The photos don’t catch it well but the gold looks more natural opposed to highly polished. I prefer this look. The black and Orange coloring look like it was done very well. Very nice collectables. Prompt responses and communication from rarity check. Looking forward to what the future offerings In this set will look like! Coin looks great! thank you for the kind words!

comments.author: 2stout
comments.body: Gotta bump the sales thread!  These graded very well.  I have more than the 2 pictured and none graded lower than MS69, even had an MS70, quite pleased!

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: 2stout on November 16, 2022, 04:01:04 AMGotta bump the sales thread!  These graded very well.  I have more than the 2 pictured and none graded lower than MS69, even had an MS70, quite pleased! Wow! thank you for this!

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.created_time: November 21, 2022, 05:20:24 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 05:09:01 PM by krogothmanhattan
comments.body: Coin arrived...awesome looking coin...love the designs and colors as well! Cheers!

comments.author: QuakerBull
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on November 21, 2022, 05:20:24 PM  Coin arrived...awesome looking coin...love the designs and colors as well! Cheers!   Yo Krog! I like this ninja figure! Looks epic! How can I get one?

comments.author: Hhampuz
comments.body: Ordered some of these and picked them up today. Looks and feels great! Nice quality, packaging was great and the certificates are a nice addition! Thank you much for the extras too @raritycheck Can recommend!!

comments.author: krogoth
comments.body: Quote from: QuakerBull on November 23, 2022, 05:09:56 PMQuote from: krogothmanhattan on November 21, 2022, 05:20:24 PM  Coin arrived...awesome looking coin...love the designs and colors as well! Cheers!   Yo Krog! I like this ninja figure! Looks epic! How can I get one?  Hi...had it custom made....the head is from my trademark design. Glad you like.     The base is made of marble and drilled inside is hole where I have a paper wallet loaded with BTC. As you can see the person is sitting on a security hologram. So the whole thing is loaded with BTC

comments.author: BobbyCoins
comments.body: One more picture of these beauties for the community... Really a great coin and overall job you've done @raritycheck! I definitively want to see more coins and designs coming out of the rainbow series or at least from this producer... so I gotta bump this thread^^

comments.author: raritycheck
comments.body: Quote from: BobbyCoins on January 06, 2023, 12:21:24 PMOne more picture of these beauties for the community... Really a great coin and overall job you've done @raritycheck! I definitively want to see more coins and designs coming out of the rainbow series or at least from this producer... so I gotta bump this thread^^Thank you!!
